Reviews.Title: Phone died quickly
Reviews.Author: M. Michaud
Reviews.Content: One other reviewer had the same experience, phone will not boot up after only 104 days in use. Do not buy this phone.

Reviews.Title: Service good, phone horrible.
Reviews.Author: Phoenix
Reviews.Content: I got the phones (two) and they were great at the moment but as we kept using them the phones started to change its program to Spanish, freeze, lag on text and never received any text. Great phone idea but just the program and phone needs help.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: richard seales
Reviews.Content: this product is very good , working well keep it up guys im l o v i n g it.

Reviews.Title: Diappointed
Reviews.Author: Duane K. Chambers
Reviews.Content: The manual for the phone was illegible.  It was small print and looked as if t had been reproduced many times.  The poor quality of the manual made it impossible to use.  It was also not compatible with the phone service I subscribe to.  Therefore, I ended up giving it away and never used it.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Emmanuel Masumbuko
Reviews.Content: this phone is a great phone, i will definitely recommend this phone to my friend to purchase this phone. thanks

Reviews.Title: Suck
Reviews.Author: Msrkcw
Reviews.Content: This phone suck...my husband and I both got one of these and both phones  sucked. The phones woudnt stay on longer then ten mins. And when it was on it froze every two mins. Do not buy this phone.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Brew Mobile Platform (MP); Fast 3G connectivity; HTC Sense interface
3.2-megapixel fixed-focus camera; Video capture capabilities
Onboard GPS; Bluetooth connectivity (v2.0); Music player; Video player
3.2-inch capacitive touchscreen display; Onscreen QWERTY keyboard;
ProductInfo.Name: HTC Freestyle Unlocked GSM Phone with Brew MP OS, 3G, Touchscreen, 3.2MP Camera and GPS - Grey
